mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence to Mr. Malden from A Stephens at Jacksonville
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, December 29, 1861, to Mr. Malden from A Stephens at Jacksonville. Subject: Selling liquor as a sutter to the army and how to be licensed to do so. 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
